name: TECH DINGHY
notes:
Conceived for use at college sailing programs. A number of variants of the TECH DINGHY have built over the years.
The first basic model, used primarily on inland waters, (such as the Charles River in Boston MA, USA) was later modified for use in the midwest, were they were sailed in rougher conditions.
Another version was sold as  the INTERCOLEGIATE by Paceship of Canda.
